duties_responsibilities.duty: Review the Financial Clearance Worklist daily and visit in-house patients to collect estimated patient liability amounts.
Explain all financial information, responsibilities, and work closely with outside agencies to ensure patient’s financial coverage.
Visit uninsured patients in-house, provide estimates to patients and physicians as requested.
Generate insurance verification and precertification reports daily and follow up with departments as appropriate.
Assist patients with payment arrangements and assist the Medicaid Eligibility Staff with patient financial applications.

education_certification.credential: 1 year of related experience required. Proficiency in Microsoft Office applications.
